RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Ramon De La Cruz's motion to suppress: Ramon De La Cruz's motion to suppress
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the United States District Court's denia: United States District Court's denial of Ramon De La Cruz's motion to suppress
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Ramon De La Cruz's motion to dismiss the: Ramon De La Cruz's motion to dismiss the indictment

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: driver of the tractor-trailer at the immigration checkpoint stop, interacted with Luis Pena and gave consent for search
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court that denied Ramon De La Cruz's motion to suppress and his motion to dismiss the indictment on Speedy Trial Act grounds
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena and Manuel Hernandez: United States Border Patrol Agents involved in the immigration checkpoint stop, testified at Ramon De La Cruz's trial
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.suppression hearing: hearing where evidence was presented regarding the immigration checkpoint stop and the search of the tractor-trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz's motion to suppress: motion filed by Ramon De La Cruz to suppress evidence seized from the immigration checkpoint stop, challenging both the duration of the stop and the ensuing search of the tractor-trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court's denial of: ruling made by the United States District Court on Ramon De La Cruz's motion to suppress, on January 5
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz's motion to dismiss the: pretrial motion filed by Ramon De La Cruz, denied by the United States District Court
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Speedy Trial Act: governs the timing of trials, including exclusions for certain periods
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz's indictment: indictment against Ramon De La Cruz for alien transportation offenses, including conspiracy to transport aliens within the United States for commercial advantage or private financial gain
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz's trial: trial of Ramon De La Cruz for smuggling undocumented aliens, began after denial of motion to dismiss
